message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer this exceptional item to you at an introductory price of $950000. We believe this is a fair and competitive offer given the quality and value it brings. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your endeavors.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we would like to respectfully suggest a counteroffer of $900000 for our premium product. This offer still represents a significant discount compared to the product's true value, while allowing us to accommodate your financial situation. We hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget considerations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000 for your product. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Dear Bob, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating and finding a mutually agreeable price. Considering the quality and value of our product, we are pleased to offer a counterproposal of $890000. This amount still reflects a substantial discount while ensuring our business interests are met. We hope this proposal aligns well with your budget and looks forward to your positive response.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility in negotiations. Based on my budget and your previous offers, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $885000 for your product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range and allows us to reach a satisfactory agreement.
